welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bolingbrook! Enjoy the charm of our diverse community, explore our beautiful parks and trails, and experience our vibrant dining and shopping scene. We're thrilled to have you here and hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and rental car services.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Midway Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Chicago O'hare International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by United Airlines, with some international flights operated by Air Canada and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Chicago O'hare International Airport, serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The international terminal at Chicago O'hare International Airport, serving a variety of international airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a brief registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport is responsible for processing and handling all cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
